### Exercise 1

```{r m_bty}
m_bty <- lm(evals$score~evals$bty_avg)
summary(m_bty)
```

The linear model is: 

score = 3.88 + 0.07*bty_avg

The R^2 value is: 

0.035

The Adjusted R^2 is: 

0.033
